class.name: AttributeSet
class.brief_description: A resource that holds a collection of attributes.
class.description: The [AttributeSet] defines numerical values (attributes) such as Health, Mana, or Strength. It maintains a base value and a current value (which includes temporary modifiers from effects).

method.name: get_base_value
method.description: Returns the base value of the attribute (without temporary modifiers).

method.name: get_current_value
method.description: Returns the current value of the attribute (including modifiers).

method.name: has_attribute
method.description: Returns true if the attribute exists in the set.

method.name: register_attribute
method.description: Registers a new attribute in the set with an initial value.

method.name: set_base_value
method.description: Sets the base value of an attribute. This will recalculate the current value.

method.name: set_current_value
method.description: Sets the current value of an attribute directly. Use with caution.

signal.name: attribute_changed
signal.description: Emitted when an attribute's current value changes.

signal.name: attribute_pre_change
signal.description: Emitted before an attribute's value changes. Can be used to intercept or modify the change context (future implementation).
